  2. City Council

City Council

The Justin City Council is composed of a mayor and six council members.

  • City Hall - City Council Chambers 415 N College Avenue Justin, TX 76247
  • Mayor – James Clark (Term expires, May 2026)
  • Place 1 – Ryan Stevens (Term expires, May 2027)
  • Place 2 – Tomas Mendoza (Term expires, May 2027)
  • Place 3 – Steven Teschke (Term expires, May 2027)
  • Place 4  - James Castle (Term expires, May 2026)
  • Place 5 – Daniel Dennis (Term expires, May 2026)
  • Place 6 – Shelby St. Claire (Term expires, May 2026)

Agendas are posted 72 hours prior to the meeting. Minutes are posted after City Council approval.

  • Public Comments Sign-Up Form : Form will be directly submitted to the City Secretary. The online form must be submitted by 4 p.m. prior to the start of the meeting. You may also complete a paper form if attending in person. All forms should be submitted to the City Secretary, prior to the start of the meeting.

Mayor Information

The Mayor or a City Council member is available to meet with clubs, civic groups, homeowner associations, nonprofit organizations, school students and scout troops. For scheduling and information, call 940-648-2541
